item.title: ‘The Birthday Party’ Review: Willem Dafoe Uncordially Invites You to a Murky Family Melodrama
item.description: No man is an island, except, perhaps, a man who owns one. The alienating, even dehumanizing effects of extreme wealth and privilege are brought to bear in “The Birthday Party,” a grim litt
